title: New: Keyes – Veins
content:
For the past couple of weeks, I’ve had constant page suggestions to ‘like’ Keyes (Jade Keywood) on Facebook, despite her at the time having no music to her name, and only a handful of Facebook fans.

Seeing her debut single drop via P&P this afternoon, I had a sneaking suspicion that it would be pretty rad, and it definitely doesn’t disappoint. Sort of like a mix between Glasgow’s rapidly rising KLOE, Charli XCX’s debut album and Lorde, Veins marks Keyes out as a talent to keep an eye on.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
